definition: a catch mechanism that acts as a switch
details:
noun
- a catch mechanism that acts as a switch
= example: a catch mechanism that acts as a switch
= synonyms: trip
- a tourist who is visiting sights of interest
= synonyms: rubberneck, sightseer, excursionist
- a walker or runner who trips and almost falls
= synonyms: stumbler
- (slang) someone who has taken a psychedelic drug and is undergoing hallucinations
